page.title: 04EVENTS IN CHITTERNE
page.content: The year's events start on Shrove Tuesday with Pancake tossing, and a gathering for hot pancakes and coffee in the Village Hall. On Easter Sunday there is Egg Rolling and a children's Easter Bonnet Parade, with refreshments afterwards. In August a children's Gymkhana is held, from Leading Rein to Show Jumping; this is in conjunction with a Fete for the Village Hall. A Flower Festival takes place in the Church, the profits going to the Church Restoration Fund. On 5th November a Bonfire, Fireworks Display and a Barbeque are organised on the Sports Field. December sees the annual Church Bazaar, and nearer Christmas the W.I. organises a Supper Party for the villagers. Other events include Hunt Meets Coffee Mornings and Bingo Evenings.
